name: Midnight (itch) (JoeJoeSpagettio)
description:
Your in 3rd grade as you wake up, you grab a candle and go to look for your parents, although something is... off, 

Come play this short single player horror game!

Please Note, this is not perfect, if anything this is an early access so EXPECT bugs/glitches and make sure to report them!

i disabled donations because i did this for fun, not for money :)
